sources.title: Devils of Darkness (1965) William Sylvester, Hubert Noël, Carole Gray | Full Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
He's a Vampire with a Cult Following.
A secret vampire cult, which has its headquarters beneath the town cemetery, searches for victims for its human sacrifice rituals.

Original title: Devils of Darkness (1965) 
Director: Lance Comfort
Writer: Lyn Fairhurst
Stars: William Sylvester, Hubert Noël, Carole Gray
Genre: Horror
Budget: £110,000

00:00:00 Introduction - full length movie
00:07:43 Title credits
00:09:03 The hotel
00:14:36 Deadly caves
00:17:22 Gypsy prediction
00:30:50 Cult meeting
00:41:50 Swingin' 60s party
00:51:28 Research
01:01:12 Telling scotland yard
01:10:02 Night visitor
01:19:24 Final ritual

This video is available with subtitles in more than 30 languages. Click on ⚙️ and choose your preferred language.

metadata.Plot: In a sleepy town in Britanny, Armond du Moliere, the Count Sinistre, and his Gypsy bride Tanya, vampires, control everything through a dark, bloody cult. English tourists disturb their cave coffins and must die, but Paul Baxter escapes and takes with him the count' golden bat talisman. To retrieve it and exact revenge, the whole cult follows to England, lusting for blood, a cover-up and new recruits, which also causes jealousy.
metadata.Actors: William Sylvester, Hubert Noël, Carole Gray
